comments:
Build: I20070501-0010

I got this NPE while creating a new Java launch configuration.  After finding the NPE in the log, I tried to go back and reproduce, but couldn't get the error to happen again.

Created an attachment (id=65690)
patch

Happens when we try to create a new config and the original configuration is null, but we make the call getOriginal().getWorkingCopy() without checking if there is an original.

Easiest way to reproduce is to try and create a new Java Applet config from the Run/Debug properties page.
Curtis please review and apply patch
